scenario.english: A man visits a new restaurant for the first time
scenario.spanish: Un hombre visita un restaurante nuevo por primera vez
scenario.spanish_phonetic: oon om-bre ve-si-ta oon res-tow-ran-te nwe-bo por pree-me-rah ves
scenario.french: Un homme visite un nouveau restaurant pour la première fois
scenario.french_phonetic: un om vee-zeet un noo-vo res-toh-rahn poor lah preh-myehr fwah
scenario.italian: Un uomo visita un nuovo ristorante per la prima volta
scenario.italian_phonetic: oon wo-mo vee-si-ta oon nwo-vo ree-sto-ran-te per lah pree-ma vol-ta
scenario.chinese: 一个男人第一次去一家新餐厅
scenario.chinese_phonetic: yī gè nán rén dì yī cì qù yī jiā xīn cān tīng
scenario.arabic: رجل يزور مطعماً جديداً لأول مرة
scenario.arabic_phonetic: ra-jul ya-zoor mat'a-man ja-dee-dan li-aw-wal mar-ra
scenario.amharic: አንድ ሰው ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ አዲስ ምግብ ቤት ይጎበኛል
scenario.amharic_phonetic: and sew le-me-je-me-ri-ya gi-ze a-dis megib bet yi-go-ben-yal
scenario.tigrinya: ሰብ ኣብ ሓድሽ ቤት መግቢ ንቀዳማይ ግዜ ይእቱ
scenario.tigrinya_phonetic: seb ab hadish bet megibi nqe-da-may gize y'itu
scenario.oromo: Dhiiron mana nyaataa haaraa yeroo jalqabaa tajaajila
scenario.oromo_phonetic: dhi-i-ron ma-na nyaa-taa haa-raa ye-roo jal-qa-baa ta-jaa-ji-la
scenario.somali: Nin mar ugu horreysa restaurant cusub booqdaa
scenario.somali_phonetic: nin mar u-gu hor-ray-sa res-tau-rant cu-sub booq-daa
scenario.hadiyaa: Woma heettino manaa nyaatii hankaara ke awwallaa koshshe
scenario.hadiyaa_phonetic: wo-ma hey-ti-no ma-naa nyaa-tii han-kaa-ra ke a-wal-laa kosh-she
scenario.wolayitta: Wodaa maccaatiissi ke maxaafootiyo ke ge'e
scenario.wolayitta_phonetic: wo-daa ma-chaa-tii-ssi ke ma-kaa-foo-ti-yo ke ge-e
scenario.afar: Ku-Duudum ke Qaddaara ke Qadaara ke
scenario.afar_phonetic: ku-duu-dum ke qa-da-ra ke qa-daa-ra ke
scenario.swahili: Mwanamume anatembelea mkahawa mpya kwa mara ya kwanza
scenario.swahili_phonetic: mwa-na-mu-me a-na-tem-be-le-a m-ka-ha-wa m-pya kwa ma-ra ya kwan-za
scenario.kinyarwanda: Umugabo agenda gusura restora nshya bwa mbere
scenario.kinyarwanda_phonetic: u-mu-ga-bo a-gen-da gu-su-ra res-to-ra nshya bwa m-be-re
scenario.kirundi: Umugabo agenda gusura restora nshya bwa mbere
scenario.kirundi_phonetic: u-mu-ga-bo a-gen-da gu-su-ra res-to-ra nshya bwa m-be-re
scenario.luo: Dichuo nyuolo restaurant manyien mar achiel
scenario.luo_phonetic: di-chuo nyu-o-lo res-tau-rant ma-nyien mar a-chiel

exchanges.speaker: Waiter
exchanges.english: Good evening! Welcome to Bella Vista. How many in your party today?
exchanges.spanish: ¡Buenas tardes! Bienvenido a Bella Vista. ¿Cuántas personas son hoy?
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: bwe-nas tar-des! byen-ve-nee-do a be-ya vis-ta. kwan-tas per-so-nas son oy?
exchanges.french: Bonsoir ! Bienvenue à Bella Vista. Combien de personnes aujourd'hui ?
exchanges.french_phonetic: bon-swahr! byen-ve-nu a be-la vis-ta. kom-byen de per-son oh-zhoor-dwee?
exchanges.italian: Buonasera! Benvenuto al Bella Vista. Quante persone siete oggi?
exchanges.italian_phonetic: bwo-na-se-ra! ben-ve-nu-to al be-la vis-ta. kwan-te per-so-ne sye-te oj-ji?
exchanges.chinese: 晚上好！欢迎来到贝拉维斯塔。今天你们有几位？
exchanges.chinese_phonetic: wǎn shàng hǎo! huān yíng lái dào bèi lā wéi sī tǎ. jīn tiān nǐ men yǒu jǐ wèi?
exchanges.arabic: مساء الخير! مرحباً بكم في بيلا فيستا. كم عدد الأشخاص في مجموعتكم اليوم؟
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: ma-saa al-khayr! mar-ha-ban bi-kum fee bee-la fees-ta. kam a-dad al-ash-khas fee maj-moo-at-kum al-yawm?
exchanges.amharic: መልካም ማታ! እንኳን ወደ ቤላ ቪስታ በደህና መጡ። ስንት ሰው ነዎት?
exchanges.amharic_phonetic: mel-kam ma-ta! en-kwan we-de be-la vis-ta be-deh-na me-tu. sint sew ne-wo-t?
exchanges.tigrinya: ምሉእ ምሸት! ናብ ቤላ ቪስታ ብደሓን መጻእኩም። ክንደይ ሰባት ኢኹም?
exchanges.tigrinya_phonetic: mel-u'e mi-shet! nab be-la vis-ta b-de-han met-sa'e-kum. kin-dey se-bat i-khum?
exchanges.oromo: Akkam bulte! Bella Vista seenaa keessan. Maatii keessan meeqa?
exchanges.oromo_phonetic: ak-kam bul-te! be-la vis-ta sey-naa keys-san. maa-tii keys-san mey-qa?
exchanges.somali: Galab wanaagsan! Soo dhawoow Bella Vista. Immisa qof ayaa maanta wadajir tahay?
exchanges.somali_phonetic: ga-lab wa-naag-san! soo dha-woow be-la vis-ta. im-mi-sa qof a-yaa maan-ta wa-da-jir ta-hay?
exchanges.hadiyaa: Hank'anam be'no! Bella Vista hemmo. Hank'ina ayaan be'e?
exchanges.hadiyaa_phonetic: han-ka-na-m bey-no! be-la vis-ta hem-mo. han-ki-na a-yaan be-e?
exchanges.wolayitta: Oottanata wolqaa! Bella Vista wo'iya. Wodaa me'iya?
exchanges.wolayitta_phonetic: oot-ta-na-ta wol-kaa! be-la vis-ta wo-i-ya. wo-daa me-i-ya?
exchanges.afar: Barrih Qaadih! Bella Vista Akah. Labhi Kinni?
exchanges.afar_phonetic: bar-rih qaa-dih! be-la vis-ta a-kah. lab-hi kin-ni?
exchanges.gamo: Halaqa wolqaa! Bella Vista he'iya. Wodaa me'iya?
exchanges.gamo_phonetic: ha-la-qa wol-kaa! be-la vis-ta he-i-ya. wo-daa me-i-ya?
exchanges.swahili: Habari ya jioni! Karibu Bella Vista. Watu wangapi leo?
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: ha-ba-ri ya jio-ni! ka-ri-bu be-la vis-ta. wa-tu wan-ga-pi le-o?
exchanges.kinyarwanda: Mwiriwe neza! Murakaza neza muri Bella Vista. Abantu bangahe muri iki gihugu?
exchanges.kinyarwanda_phonetic: mwi-ri-we ne-za! mu-ra-ka-za ne-za mu-ri be-la vis-ta. a-ban-tu ban-ga-he mu-ri i-ki gi-hu-gu?
exchanges.kirundi: Mwiriwe neza! Murakaza neza muri Bella Vista. Abantu bangahe muri iki gihugu?
exchanges.kirundi_phonetic: mwi-ri-we ne-za! mu-ra-ka-za ne-za mu-ri be-la vis-ta. a-ban-tu ban-ga-he mu-ri i-ki gi-hu-gu?
exchanges.luo: Oriti! Pok Bella Vista. Ji nade?
exchanges.luo_phonetic: o-ri-ti! pok be-la vis-ta. ji na-de?

exchanges.speaker: Customer
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: bwe-nas tar-des! so-lo oo-no, por fa-vor.
exchanges.french: Bonsoir ! Un seul, s'il vous plaît.
exchanges.french_phonetic: bon-swahr! un sel, see voo ple.
exchanges.chinese_phonetic: wǎn shàng hǎo! jiù yī wèi, xiè xiè.
exchanges.arabic: مساء الخير! واحد فقط، من فضلك.
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: ma-saa al-khayr! wa-hed fa-kat, min fad-lak.
exchanges.amharic: መልካም ማታ! አንድ ሰው ብቻ፣ እባክህ።
exchanges.amharic_phonetic: mel-kam ma-ta! and sew bi-cha, e-bach.
exchanges.swahili: Habari ya jioni! Mmoja tu, tafadhali.
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: ha-ba-ri ya jio-ni! m-mo-ja tu, ta-fa-dha-li.

summary.english: A complete restaurant interaction from greeting to farewell, showing typical exchanges between a first-time customer and restaurant staff.
summary.spanish: Una interacción completa en un restaurante desde el saludo hasta la despedida, que muestra intercambios típicos entre un cliente por primera vez y el personal del restaurante.
summary.spanish_phonetic: oo-na in-te-rak-syon kom-ple-ta en oon res-tow-ran-te des-de el sa-lu-do as-ta la des-pe-di-da, ke mwes-tra in-ter-kan-byos tee-pi-kos en-tre oon kli-en-te por pree-me-rah ves ee el per-so-nal del res-tow-ran-te
summary.french: Une interaction complète dans un restaurant, de l'accueil à l'au revoir, montrant les échanges typiques entre un client pour la première fois et le personnel du restaurant.
summary.french_phonetic: oo-n in-te-rak-syon kom-plet dahn zun res-toh-rahn, de lah-ke-y a lo-re-vwar, mon-tran lez ay-shanj tee-pik an-tre un klee-an poor lah preh-myehr fwah ey le per-so-nel du res-toh-rahn
summary.italian: Un'interazione completa in un ristorante dal saluto all'addio, che mostra scambi tipici tra un cliente per la prima volta e il personale del ristorante.
summary.italian_phonetic: oo-nin-te-ra-tsyo-ne kom-ple-ta in oon ree-sto-ran-te dal sa-lu-to al-lad-dyo, ke mo-stra skam-bi tee-pi-chi tra oon kli-en-te per lah pree-ma vol-ta ey il per-so-na-le del ree-sto-ran-te
summary.chinese: 从问候到告别的完整餐厅互动，展示首次顾客与餐厅工作人员之间的典型交流。
summary.chinese_phonetic: cóng wèn hòu dào gào bié de wán zhěng cān tīng hù dòng, zhǎn shì shǒu cì gù kè yǔ cān tīng gōng zuò rén yuán zhī jiān de diǎn xíng jiāo liú.
summary.arabic: تفاعل كامل في مطعم من التحية إلى الوداع، يظهر التبادلات النموذجية بين عميل لأول مرة وموظفي المطعم.
summary.arabic_phonetic: ta-faa-ul ka-mil fee mat'am min at-ta-hee-ya i-la al-wi-daa', ya-ther at-ta-baa-dil-at an-nu-mu-tha-ji-ya bay-na a-meel li-aw-wal mar-ra wa mu-wa-tha-fi al-mat'am.
summary.amharic: ከሰላምታ እስከ ሰላምታ የሚደርስ የምግብ ቤት ግንኙነት፣ በመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የሚመጣ ደንበኛ እና የምግብ ቤት ሰራተኞች መካከል የሚደረጉ የተለመዱ ውይይቶችን የሚያሳይ።
summary.amharic_phonetic: ke-se-lam-ta es-ke se-lam-ta ye-mi-di-res ye-megib bet gen-yu-net, be-me-je-me-ri-ya gi-ze ye-mi-me-ta den-be-nya e-na ye-megib bet se-ra-teg-noch me-ka-kel ye-mi-de-re-gu ye-te-le-me-du we-yiy-to-chin ye-mi-ya-shiy.
summary.tigrinya: ምሉእ ትሕዝቶ ናይ ቤት መግቢ ካብ ሰላምታ ክሳዕ ደናገር፣ ንቀዳማይ ግዜ ዝመጽእ ክፍሊን ሰራሕተኛታት ቤት መግቢን መንጎ ዝኸውን ተራ ዝዀነ ወራይራ ዘርኢ።
summary.tigrinya_phonetic: mel-u'e t'hiz-to nay bet megibi kab se-lam-ta k'sa'e de-na-ger, nqe-da-may gize zmets'e kif-lin se-rah-teg-na-tat bet megibin men-go zkhe-win te-ra zkhwe-ne we-ray-ra zr'i.
summary.oromo: Seenaa guutuu mana nyaataa irraa akkaataa salaamuu fi akkaataa nagaachuu hanga, akkaataa dhiyeessaa maxxansaa tajaajilaa mana nyaataa fi maksiisaa yeroo jalqabaa wajjin.
summary.oromo_phonetic: sey-naa guu-tuu ma-na nyaa-taa ir-raa ak-kaa-taa sa-laa-muu fi ak-kaa-taa na-gaa-chuu han-ga, ak-kaa-taa dhi-yees-saa mak-saan-saa ta-jaa-ji-laa ma-na nyaa-taa fi mak-sii-saa ye-roo jal-qa-baa waj-jin.
summary.somali: Isgaarsi buuxa oo ka bilow salaanta ilaa nabadgelyada, muujinaya wada hadal caadi ah oo u dhexeeya macaamiilka mar ugu horreysa iyo shaqaalaha restaurant-ka.
summary.somali_phonetic: is-gaar-si buu-xa oo ka bi-low sa-laan-ta i-laa na-bad-gel-ya-da, muu-ji-na-ya wa-da ha-dal caa-di ah oo u dhe-xey-ya ma-caa-miil-ka mar u-gu hor-ray-sa i-yo sha-qa-a-la-ha res-tau-rant-ka.
summary.hadiyaa: Heettino manaa nyaatii ke hallaa heettino nabadgelyaa hanga, ayaa be'iya woyiyto ke awwallaa mo'otta ke wo yookkata manaa nyaatii ke.
summary.hadiyaa_phonetic: hey-ti-no ma-naa nyaa-tii ke hal-laa hey-ti-no na-bad-gel-yaa han-ga, a-yaa be-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke a-wal-laa mo-o-tta ke wo yoo-kka-ta ma-naa nyaa-tii ke.
summary.wolayitta: Heettino maxaafootiyo ke gaafiya heettino nabadgelyaa hanga, ayaa wo'iya woyiyto ke issi dobbeesaa ke wo maccaa maxaafootiyo ke.
summary.wolayitta_phonetic: hey-ti-no ma-kaa-foo-ti-yo ke gaa-fi-ya hey-ti-no na-bad-gel-yaa han-ga, a-yaa wo-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke is-si do-bey-saa ke wo ma-chaa ma-kaa-foo-ti-yo ke.
summary.afar: Duudum Qaddaara ke Nabaay Duudum Nabadgelyaa Gadda, Muujiya Wada Hadal Caadi Ku-Duudum Gaddali Awwal wo Qaddara Qaddaara ke.
summary.afar_phonetic: duu-dum qa-da-ra ke na-baay duu-dum na-bad-gel-yaa ga-da, muu-ji-ya wa-da ha-dal caa-di ku-duu-dum ga-da-li a-wal wo qa-da-ra qa-da-ra ke.
summary.gamo: Heettino hank'aa ke yookka heettino nabadgelyaa hanga, ayaa he'iya woyiyto ke issi oshshaa ke wo de'eta hank'aa ke.
summary.gamo_phonetic: hey-ti-no han-kaa ke yoo-kka hey-ti-no na-bad-gel-yaa han-ga, a-yaa he-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke is-si osh-shaa ke wo de-e-ta han-kaa ke.
summary.swahili: Mwingiliano kamili wa mkahawa kutoka salamu hadi kwaheri, unaonyesha mabadilishano ya kawaida kati ya mteja wa mara ya kwanza na wafanyakazi wa mkahawa.
summary.swahili_phonetic: m-wingi-lia-no ka-mi-li wa m-ka-ha-wa ku-to-ka sa-la-mu ha-di kwa-he-ri, u-na-o-nye-sha ma-ba-di-li-sha-no ya ka-wai-da ka-ti ya m-te-ja wa ma-ra ya kwan-za na wa-fa-nya-ka-zi wa m-ka-ha-wa.
summary.kinyarwanda: Uburyo bwuzuye bwo kugana mu restora kuva mu kuvugisha neza kugeza mu kuganira, bigaragaza ibiganiro bisanzwe hagati y'umukiriya wa mbere n'abakozi ba restora.
summary.kinyarwanda_phonetic: u-bu-ryo bwu-zu-ye bwo ku-ga-na mu res-to-ra ku-va mu ku-vu-gi-sha ne-za ku-ge-za mu ku-ga-ni-ra, bi-ga-ra-ga-za i-bi-ga-ni-ro bi-san-zwe ha-ga-ti y'u-mu-ki-ri-ya wa m-be-re n'a-ba-ko-zi ba res-to-ra.
summary.kirundi: Uburyo bwuzuye bwo kugana mu restora kuva mu kuvugisha neza kugeza mu kuganira, bigaragaza ibiganiro bisanzwe hagati y'umukiriya wa mbere n'abakozi ba restora.
summary.kirundi_phonetic: u-bu-ryo bwu-zu-ye bwo ku-ga-na mu res-to-ra ku-va mu ku-vu-gi-sha ne-za ku-ge-za mu ku-ga-ni-ra, bi-ga-ra-ga-za i-bi-ga-ni-ro bi-san-zwe ha-ga-ti y'u-mu-ki-ri-ya wa m-be-re n'a-ba-ko-zi ba res-to-ra.
summary.luo: Bed e restaurant koso kamano gi hero, neno e kamano mar nyuolo manyien gi jatembe.
summary.luo_phonetic: bed e res-tau-rant ko-so ka-ma-no gi he-ro, ne-no e ka-ma-no mar nyu-o-lo ma-nyien gi ja-tem-be.
